section.title: About Survey Bot
section.desc: Are you tired of begging your friends to fill out a survey? Or maybe (like me) you realize that you have a project due tonight, and for that you need quantitative researched data. But you don't have that so what do you do?

section.title: Presenting surveyBot
section.desc: Too smoothen out the workflow, spades also have an android app to reach out as many people as possible.

section.title: What does it do?
section.desc:
I know most of you have used google forms and you must know that whenever you fill out a survey all the records are stored in an excel(spreadsheet) file which you can download and do whatever you want to with it. 
 This time you dont have to fill out a survey, instead you create a form on this webapp(I mean just fill out the question you are going to ask).
